data_table.description: This sample attributes table includes body site where sample was collected, analyte type, sequencing center, funding source, TOPMed phase and project, source repository where subjects originated, and sequencing control indicator.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing

variable.name: TOPMed_Project
variable.description: TOPMED Project subgroup sample selected for

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CONTROL
variable.description: TRUE if sample included for control purposes, FALSE otherwise
